TopicTitle: Jeb went to "Jool and beyond the infinite"

Articles.Content:
You need to be listening to some Strauss to fully appreciate this...[https://dl-web.dropbox.com/get/Kevin_MacLeod_-_Richard_Strauss_Also_Sprach_Zarathustra.mp3?_subject_uid=175521756&w=AACm7GblzWfIz8Jfib6iQZOD-VuqC_YTApkFSbVGZb8mSQ](https://dl-web.dropbox.com/get/Kevin_MacLeod_-_Richard_Strauss_Also_Sprach_Zarathustra.mp3?_subject_uid=175521756&w=AACm7GblzWfIz8Jfib6iQZOD-VuqC_YTApkFSbVGZb8mSQ)

Uncovered on the Mun...

![BCPxJxV.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/BCPxJxV.jpg)

"My God. It's full of stars"...

![nE13NOl.png](http://i.imgur.com/nE13NOl.png)

![ANAjfOH.png](http://i.imgur.com/ANAjfOH.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-24T19:45:32Z" title="02/24/2015 07:45  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 24, 2015</time> by Foxster**

Always been a fan of that movie. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

BTW, if you want a ship to go with that:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/3hkal)
How's the AE-35 unit on that thing? Reliable?

[geek]I hear it's pretty reliable. If you do start to get a problem then you swap it for the spare. If that makes no difference then just put the old one back and hold your breath.[/geek]

btw, here's a little look behind the scenes of Stanley Kerbricks latest set...

![DSOtLiX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/DSOtLiX.jpg)

Yup, I took a ship along for the shots.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-24T20:10:05Z" title="02/24/2015 08:10  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 24, 2015</time> by Foxster**

> 
> [geek]I hear it's pretty reliable. If you do start to get a problem then you swap it for the spare. If that makes no difference then ***just put the old one back and hold your breath.***[/geek]

LOL. I'd rep you again, if it would let me. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Jeb does seem like the sort of guy who'd jump through space because he left his helmet (and the keys to the pod bay doors) inside.

> 
> Always been a fan of that movie. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> BTW, if you want a ship to go with that:
> 
> [http://imgur.com/a/3hkal](http://imgur.com/a/3hkal)

It should be noted the original Discovery was built in LEO (Maybe Lunar orbit, my brain is a lil fried atm). I dare ya to replicate that effort.

I'm sure Jeb is fine.

He might not know what to do.

But he will think of something.

> 
> BTW, if you want a ship to go with that:

haha "Warning: Evil computer" ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

-Slashy
